text:
The following snippet

  <target name="zip">
    <delete file="a.zip"/>
    <touch file="a"/>
    <zip zipfile="a.zip">
      <zipfileset dir="." filemode="755" includes="a"/>
    </zip>
    <touch file="b"/>
    <zip zipfile="a.zip" update="true">
      <fileset dir="." includes="b"/>
    </zip>
  </target>

will create an archive in which a has not the filemode 755 - before updating
the archive it has.

fixed as good as possible with nightly build 2003-07-31.

The only remaining issue is that directories will lose the permissions if they
get added before the old archive is touched.  I'll try to document that case.
